column1: text
Riddle: What number becomes zero when you subtract 15 from half of it? Solution: 30
Riddle: I am an odd number. Take away a letter and I become even. What number am I? Solution: Seven
Riddle: If you multiply me by any other number, the answer will always be the same. What number am I? Solution: Zero
Riddle: What three positive numbers give the same result when multiplied and added together? Solution: 1, 2, 3
Riddle: I am a number. If you add 5 to me and then multiply by 3, the result is 36. What number am I? Solution: 7
Riddle: What is the smallest whole number that is equal to seven times the sum of its digits? Solution: 21
Riddle: If you divide 30 by half and add 10, what is the result? Solution: 70
Riddle: What number is twice the sum of its digits? Solution: 18
Riddle: I am a number. If you double me and subtract 8, you get 12. What number am I? Solution: 10
Riddle: What is the next number in the sequence: 2, 4, 8, 16, ___? Solution: 32
Riddle: What number is the same as its double? Solution: 0
Riddle: I am a number. If you add 10 to me, I become 20. What number am I? Solution: 10
Riddle: What is the only even prime number? Solution: 2
Riddle: I am a number. If you square me, I become 16. What number am I? Solution: 4
Riddle: What is the smallest number that is divisible by both 6 and 8? Solution: 24
Riddle: I am a number. If you add 7 to me, I become 21. What number am I? Solution: 14
Riddle: What is the next number in the sequence: 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, ___? Solution: 13
Riddle: I am a number. If you subtract 5 from me, I become 10. What number am I? Solution: 15
Riddle: What is the smallest number that is a multiple of both 3 and 5? Solution: 15
Riddle: I am a number. If you multiply me by 4, I become 20. What number am I? Solution: 5
Riddle: What is the next number in the sequence: 3, 6, 9, 12, ___? Solution: 15
Riddle: I am a number. If you add 12 to me, I become 24. What number am I? Solution: 12
Riddle: What is the smallest number that is divisible by both 4 and 7? Solution: 28
Riddle: I am a number. If you subtract 8 from me, I become 12. What number am I? Solution: 20
Riddle: What is the next number in the sequence: 10, 20, 30, 40, ___? Solution: 50
Riddle: I am a number. If you multiply me by 5, I become 25. What number am I? Solution: 5
Riddle: What is the smallest number that is divisible by both 9 and 12? Solution: 36
Riddle: I am a number. If you add 15 to me, I become 30. What number am I? Solution: 15
Riddle: What is the next number in the sequence: 5, 10, 20, 40, ___? Solution: 80
Riddle: I am a number. If you subtract 10 from me, I become 5. What number am I? Solution: 15
